name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium noise-canceling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life. Features deep bass, crystal clear audio, and comfortable over-ear design perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Watch Pro
description: Advanced smartwatch with health monitoring, GPS tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant design with customizable watch faces and fitness tracking features.

name: Laptop Backpack
description: Durable laptop backpack with USB charging port and anti-theft design. Fits 15.6 inch laptops with multiple compartments for organization.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical gaming keyboard with blue switches. Features customizable lighting, programmable keys, and durable aluminum frame.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with precision tracking and silent clicks. Long battery life and comfortable grip for all-day use.

name: Portable Charger
description: 20000mAh portable power bank with fast charging. Charges multiple devices simultaneously with LED power indicator.

name: Desk Lamp LED
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Touch control with USB charging port built-in.

name: Coffee Mug Warmer
description: Electric coffee mug warmer with auto shut-off. Keeps your drinks at the perfect temperature all day long.
